replies.body: I play tankplank support often enough and the extra ad his e gives more of an impact to the adc then you would think and because in a team fight if you just use E once you get a penta assist without actually having to attack each enemy yourself and along with his Q passive and relic shield he gets gold flowing in which in turn means he gets quite tanky quite early which is nice.

His strong, but useless which is why he isn't picked more.

No real CC/tankiness in a damage build (reason he doesn't work top as much), takes a long while to get to his power point (reason he doesn't really work mid),

His one of those champions that are just slow building and useless due to it.
yeah that stattik shiv q is OP

I agree with this. I'm not very good with GP but played him in ARAM yesterday. Usually I go AP GP but decided to go crit based instead and it worked like a charm. Kept hitting their carries for about half health with my Q once I got shiv and IE.
